name: Pixel Garden (Troube)
description:
Pixel Garden is a 2D game made in two days for the Spring 2D Jam in which you grow your own vegetables and try to sell them at the best price possible.


Tutorial

Plant vegatables in the garden and use the offers panel  to sell them.

You can buy seeds from the shop . To change what kind of seeds you re planting, use Q and E.

Once you dont have anything else to do, end the day . Each day you need to pay 20  for rent. If you dont have enough money, you lose.

To win the game you need to make it to day 36.

All assets were made by me during the jam, except the sounds which are from freesound.org
